skills.name: NAPALM SCREAM
desc: • Deals one hit of physical and one hit of magic damage to a single target.
• 35% Chance to inflict 2 Physical Burns on all enemies for 2 turns.
• 35% Chance to inflict 2 Magic Burns on all enemies for 2 turns.
• Damage dealt based on the enemy’s Missing HP.

skills.name: FREEDOM'S STAIN
desc: • Heal all allies based on their SPECIAL stat.
• Increase the DEF and MR of all allies for 2 turns.

skills.name: SALTED NUKE
desc: • Deals one hit of physical and one hit of magic damage to all enemies.
• 35% Chance to inflict Crave on enemies for 2 turns.
• 35% Chance to inflict Grievous Burn on enemies for 2 turns.
• Damage dealt based on the enemy’s Missing HP.

skills.name: COBALT BOMB
desc: • Deals one hit of physical and one hit of magic damage to all enemies.
• Remove Beneficial Effects from up to 2 random enemies.
• 35% Chance to inflict a Time Bomb for each beneficial effect removed on the enemies.
• Instantly gain an Extra Turn.

skills.name: MACHINE OF WAR
desc: • Deals one hit of physical and one hit of magic damage to a single target.
• 50% Chance to Critically Strike on each attack.
• 35% Chance to gain Echo for 3 turns.
• 100% Chance to grant Echo to all allies for 2 turns if the enemy has Crave status.
• Damage dealt based on the enemy’s Missing HP.

skills.name: HAND OF DOOM
desc: • Deals one hit of physical and one hit of magic damage to all enemies.
• 50% Chance to instantly Trigger all Bomb effects on the target.
• 30% Chance to inflict Doom on each enemy for 5 turns.
• Damage dealt based on the enemy’s Missing HP.

skills.name: MUTUALLY ASSURED DESTRUCTION
desc: Gain a Random Defensive Effect at the start or your turn for 3 turns. Grant Immunity to Burn and Sleep effects to all allies. Inflict 3 Perfect Time Bombs for 2 turns on each enemy and deal random damage to a random enemy equal to 300% of their MAX HP when you or any ally dies. This effect can only apply once per turn for each ally. Revive with full HP, Remove all golden effects from each enemy, and inflict 3 Time Bombs for 1 turn when you die.
